[Home](./index.md) &gt; [optimistic-http](./optimistic-http.md) &gt; [OptimisticHttpRequest](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.md)

## OptimisticHttpRequest interface

Describes an object used to make optimistic http requests.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OptimisticHttpRequest<TContentType extends SupportedContentTypes = "json"> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [apiUrl](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.apiurl.md) | string | The url suffix of the api endpoint. Gets appended to base url provided with [OPTIMISTIC\_BASE\_API\_URL](./optimistic-http.optimistic_base_api_url.md) |
|  [body?](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.body.md) | {} \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The body of the http request. If contentType is set to 'formData', this body will represent key/value pairs and any nested objects are serialized. |
|  [contentType?](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.contenttype.md) | TContentType | <i>(Optional)</i> The type of content in body. Default is 'json'. |
|  [headers?](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.headers.md) | [OptimisticHttpHeaders](./optimistic-http.optimistichttpheaders.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The headers of the http request |
|  [method](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.method.md) | "POST" \| "PUT" \| "DELETE" | The http method of the request |
|  [type?](./optimistic-http.optimistichttprequest.type.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> An optional string that identifies the type of request |
